blood.author: nag
blood.post: Mark 14:1-9 says it was 2 days before Passover when they were seeking a way to arrest Jesus.  Then it says he was in Bethany reclining at table when a woman poured [not sprinkled] some of the costly genuine spikenard perfumed oil onto his head.  In Matthew 26:12 Jesus says “In pouring this perfumed oil upon my body, she did it to prepare me for burial.”  In John 12:7 he says “Let her keep this for the day of my burial.”  Luke 22:44 says He was in such agony and he prayed so fervently that his sweat became like drops of blood falling on the ground.  The oil and the blood and sweat must have been mixed on his skin.
blood.title: Were Some Bloodstains Added Later or Maybe Retouched?
